title: KI Puzzle 1000 Piece Puzzle for Adults Madalina Tantareanu Cities at Midnight: Prague Art Jigsaw Puzzle 27x20 KI Puzzles
descriptions:
Title: KI Puzzle 1000 Piece Puzzle for Adults – Cities at Midnight: Prague by Madalina Tantareanu (27 x 20 inches)

Overview:
Lose yourself in the luminous charm of Prague after dark with this 1000-piece jigsaw puzzle featuring artwork by Madalina Tantareanu. Designed for adults who love a satisfying challenge, this richly colored “Cities at Midnight: Prague” scene delivers hours of immersive, mindful entertainment and a stunning display-worthy finish at 27 x 20 inches when assembled.

Key Features:
- 1000-piece challenge: A rewarding build for adults and seasoned puzzlers.  
- Captivating artwork: Bold, bright, and colorful depiction of Prague at midnight by artist Madalina Tantareanu.  
- Finished size: 27 inches wide x 20 inches high (assembled).  
- Low mess: Very low puzzle dust for a cleaner, more pleasant puzzling experience.  
- Eco-conscious materials: Made from recycled paperboard.  
- Visual aid included: Full-color poster image guide to help you along the way.  
- Secure packaging: Pieces arrive in a sealed plastic bag to keep them safe and organized.

What’s in the Box:
- 1000 puzzle pieces in a sealed bag  
- Full-color poster image guide/reference sheet

Why You’ll Love It:
- Challenging and fun: Perfect for focus, relaxation, and that “just one more piece” feeling.  
- Versatile enjoyment: Ideal for a personal challenge, family fun night, or a relaxing lazy Sunday.  
- Great gift idea: A thoughtful choice for birthdays, holidays, or any puzzle lover.  
- Memory making: Build together, take breaks, and come back for hours of shared enjoyment.

Suggested Uses:
- Birthday gift or holiday present  
- Family activity and memory-making centerpiece  
- Boredom buster and screen-free relaxation  
- Frame it after completion to showcase the atmospheric Prague nightscape

Specifications:
- Piece count: 1000  
- Recommended audience: Adults  
- Theme: Cities at Midnight – Prague  
- Artist: Madalina Tantareanu  
- Assembled dimensions: 27 x 20 inches  
- Material: Recycled paperboard  
- Puzzle dust level: Very low  
- Packaging: Sealed plastic bag with full-color poster guide

Bring the magic of Prague’s midnight glow to your table and enjoy a beautifully challenging build from KI Puzzles.
